page.title: 06Grampound Carnival
page.content: Every year a carnival is held in September.Flags are put up in the main street.A Carnival Queen is chosen and she has two attendants.We also have a Fairy Queen and attendants. In the afternoon the children of the village have a sports meeting.They run races for medals and certificates.It is held in the recreation ground and there is a band playing.There are stalls and a fish and chip van. After the races lots of people change into funny costumes for the carnival.The people assemble on the field and are judged by important local people.You can win money cups and medals if you are judged the best in your class.There are also decorated lorries known as floats.The procession goes all through the main street.
